bug.author: muyinanhai
bug.summary: keras import error when having a flatten layer append to a embedding layer
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>keras import error when having a flatten layer</denchmark-h>
model <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13764547/36586294-30355c20-18bc-11e8-891d-0bcb9795becc.png></denchmark-link>
Exception in thread "main" org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.exceptions.UnsupportedKerasConfigurationException: Layer flatten_1 could not be mapped to Layer, Vertex, or InputPreProcessor. Please file an issue at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues>http://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues</denchmark-link> . at org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.KerasModel.getComputationGraphConfiguration(KerasModel.java:335) at org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.KerasModel.getComputationGraph(KerasModel.java:374) at org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.KerasModel.getComputationGraph(KerasModel.java:363) at org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.KerasModelImport.importKerasModelAndWeights(KerasModelImport.java:198) <denchmark-h:h4>Version Information</denchmark-h>
0.9.2-SNAPSHOT mac os high sierra

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/muyinanhai>@muyinanhai</denchmark-link> I fixed this for you, see: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4703>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4703</denchmark-link>
btw, next time opening one issue is enough ;) also, would you please consider using a gist for json etc., so we don't clutter the issue? thanks
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
